Articles.Content:
Is there a mod that allow you to adjust your RCS thrusters and reduce their thrust?

Also is is there one that can throttle the SAS system too?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-07T23:54:34Z" title="03/07/2015 11:54  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 7, 2015</time> by RuBisCO**

> 
> Is there a mod that allow you to adjust your RCS thrusters and reduce their thrust?

Right click them and use the thrust limiter.
I'm trying tweakable everything, sure now can can change decoupling force on couplers and docking ports, but I still have no menu option for throttling rcs thusters.

If you hit CAPSLOCK while in flight, you enter "fine controls" mode, where RCS and SAS controls are scaled back. RCS will no longer apply full thrust, and SAS is dampened.

I don't know of any mod that allows you to adjust the thrust of RCS, however.

> 
> If you hit CAPSLOCK while in flight, you enter "fine controls" mode, where RCS and SAS controls are scaled back. RCS will no longer apply full thrust, and SAS is dampened.
> I don't know of any mod that allows you to adjust the thrust of RCS, however.

This works, its not what I wanted but it seems to get the job done, thanks. /thumbs up

> 
> This works, its not what I wanted but it seems to get the job done, thanks. /thumbs up

Glad to be of service. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> I'm trying tweakable everything, sure now can can change decoupling force on couplers and docking ports, but I still have no menu option for throttling rcs thusters.

TweakableEverything's page specifically mentions "RCS Thrust Limiter". Make sure you have a file named TweakableRCS.dll and TweakableRCS.cfg in your TweakableEverything directory.

You may have to delete the RCS thruster and then re-add it. Also, it may or may not work with your non-stock RCS blocks.

> 
> Also, it may or may not work with your non-stock RCS blocks.

Yes, you may want to double check the mod compatability list on both the mod you are using the thrusters from and Tweakable Everything. If the RCS' mod shows up on the Tweakable Everything compatability list and/or vice-versa, then try and do what hab136 suggested and delete and read the thrusters from the vehicle.
